description:
Carrot stows away! And settles in with the Straw Hats as they make their way to rescue Sanji! Meanwhile, in the Sakura Kingdom - formerly the Drum Kingdom, Dalton and Kureha are getting ready for the Reverie so as their former enemy in his newly-built kingdom…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Auf zur Reverie! – Rebecca und das Sakura Königreich!
Direction Rêverie. Rebecca et le royaume Sakura
Reverie e: Rebecca to Sakura Oukoku
To the Reverie! Rebecca and the Sakura Kingdom!
На собрание королей! Ребекка и королевство Сакура
世界会議[レヴェリー]へ レベッカとサクラ王国
